Simple example

```vue
<template>
    <div
        class="pad-l5"
        :class="{ 'scroll-y': overflow }"
        :style="{ 'max-height': overflow ? '200px' : 'none' }"
    >
        <p>
            <label>
                <input class="checkbox checkbox-small" type="checkbox" v-model="overflow" />
                <span class="pad-left-2 v-mid">container overflow: auto</span>
            </label>
        </p>
        <p>
            <label>
                <input
                    class="checkbox checkbox-small"
                    type="checkbox"
                    v-model="props.appendToBody"
                />
                <span class="pad-left-2 v-mid">appendToBody</span>
            </label>
        </p>
        <p>
            <label>
                <input class="checkbox checkbox-small" type="checkbox" v-model="props.multiple" />
                <span class="pad-left-2 v-mid">multiple</span>
            </label>
        </p>
        <ui-select class="w-6-12 p" v-model="model" v-bind="props"></ui-select>
        <p>model: {{ model }}</p>
    </div>
</template>
<script>
import UiSelect from './Select.vue';

let options = [
    'angular',
    'aurelia',
    'backbone',
    'ember',
    'meteor',
    'react',
    'riot',
    'stencil',
    'svelte',
    'vue',
].map((label, i) => ({ value: i, label }));

export default {
    components: { UiSelect },
    data() {
        return {
            model: null,
            props: {
                options: [{ value: null, label: 'nullish value' }, ...options],
                placeholder: 'Select something',
                appendToBody: false,
                multiple: false,
            },
            overflow: false,
        };
    },
};
</script>
```

Advanced example. Using value object, multi selection, slots

```vue
<template>
    <div class="pad-l5 ">
        <ui-select class="p w-6-12" v-model="model" v-bind="props">
            <template #icon-close>
                <i class="mdi mdi-plus"></i>
            </template>
            <template #icon-open>
                <i class="mdi mdi-minus"></i>
            </template>
            <template #label-multiple="{ option, value, label, deselectOption}">
                <code class="cursor-pointer" @click.stop="deselectOption(option)">{{ label }}</code>
            </template>
            <template
                #option="{ option, value, label, index, isSelected, cursorIndex, toggleOption }"
            >
                <li
                    :class="{
                        'text-bold': index == cursorIndex,
                        'bg-green': isSelected,
                    }"
                    :key="index"
                    @click="toggleOption(option)"
                >
                    {{ label }}
                </li>
            </template>
        </ui-select>
        <p>model: {{ model }}</p>
    </div>
</template>
<script>
import UiSelect from './Select.vue';

let options = [
    'angular',
    'aurelia',
    'backbone',
    'ember',
    'meteor',
    'react',
    'riot',
    'stencil',
    'svelte',
    'vue',
].map(value => ({ value, label: value }));

export default {
    components: { UiSelect },
    data() {
        return {
            model: [{ value: 'vue', label: 'vue' }],
            props: {
                options,
                multiple: true,
                valueObjects: true,
                placeholder: 'Select something',
            },
        };
    },
};
</script>
```

Runtime options

```vue
<template>
    <div class="pad-l5">
        <ui-select class="w-6-12 p" v-model="model" v-bind="props"></ui-select>
        <p>
            <label>
                <input class="checkbox checkbox-small" type="checkbox" v-model="props.multiple" />
                <span class="pad-left-2 v-mid">multiple</span>
            </label>
        </p>
        <div class="btn btn-primary p" @click="toggleOptions">toggle options</div>
        <p>model: {{ model }}</p>
    </div>
</template>
<script>
import UiSelect from './Select.vue';

let options = [
    'angular',
    'aurelia',
    'backbone',
    'ember',
    'meteor',
    'react',
    'riot',
    'stencil',
    'svelte',
    'vue',
];

export default {
    components: { UiSelect },
    data() {
        return {
            model: 'vue',
            props: {
                options: [],
                multiple: false,
            },
            overflow: false,
        };
    },
    methods: {
        toggleOptions() {
            this.props.options = this.props.options.length ? [] : options;
        },
    },
};
</script>
```
